locations.name: BTG Community Outreach (Bridging the Gap)
locations.description: Offers food distribution on Wednesdays at 5 p.m. and Saturdays at 8 a.m. They also provide home delivery for residents who are shut-in or lack transportation.
locations.schedule: Wednesdays 5:00 PM - 7:00 PM, Saturdays 8:00 AM - 1:00 PM

locations.name: Coweta Community Food Pantry (One Roof Outreach)
locations.description: Open on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays from 1–4 p.m. Patrons can pick up food boxes twice a month.

locations.name: First Baptist Church (A.O. Mission Center)
locations.description: Provides food assistance on Mondays, Tuesdays, and Wednesdays from 9–11 a.m.
locations.schedule: Mondays, Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM

locations.name: The Salvation Army Newnan Service Center
locations.description: Hosts a food pantry on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 9:30 a.m. to 12 p.m. A photo ID and completed paperwork are required.

locations.name: The I-58 Mission
locations.description: Distributes food on Thursdays from 9:30 a.m. to 2:30 p.m. When checking in for the first time, you will be asked for your Driver’s License (or other state-issued picture ID) and to complete an information form about you and your household.

locations.name: Yeager Road Community Resource Center
locations.description: Offers a mobile food pantry on the second Saturday of each month.

locations.name: Newnan City Police Department Little Free Pantry
locations.address: Newnan City Police Department parking lot, Newnan, GA 30263
locations.description: Free 24-hour little pantry available for emergency needs.

locations.name: Crossroads Food Pantry
locations.description: The Crossroads Food Pantry is located at our Thomas Crossroads Campus. Call 770-254-0291 on Tuesday's at 8am to schedule an appointment for the following week.

locations.name: New City Church Peachtree City - City Bridges Food Pantry
locations.description: Take what you need, leave what you can.

locations.name: New City Church Fairburn - City Bridges Food Pantry
locations.description: Take what you need, leave what you can.

locations.name: Real Life Center
locations.address: 975 Highway 74 North, Building E, Tyrone, Georgia 30290
locations.description: Take what you need, leave what you can.

locations.name: Mobile Food Pantry hosted by Grace Church
locations.description: To receive food, individuals must register and present one of the following forms of identification: - A valid Georgia driver's license - A state-issued ID - A passport Food is distributed per household address. If multiple families live at the same address, only one person from that address may register and receive food. Once a month (usually the third Thursday), Check-in begins at 8 AM, Car line begins at 10 AM (approximately), Breakfast is served from 8 AM to 10 AM
locations.schedule: 3rd Thursday of each month at 8:00 AM - 11:15 AM
